info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 16 at 5:36PM AST until August 16 at 10:00PM AST by NWS San Juan PR
info.description:
FFWSJU
The National Weather Service in San Juan has extended the
* Flash Flood Warning for... Saint Thomas and Saint John in the US Virgin Islands...
* Until 1000 PM AST.
* At 536 PM AST, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms, driven by Erin's outer bands, producing heavy rain across the warned area. Up to 2 inches of rain have fallen, particularly in St John. Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 3 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. Road closures are also possible during the next few hours.
HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding.
SOURCE...Radar.
IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses.
* Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... St John, Charlotte Amalie West, Anna's Retreat, Charlotte Amalie East, Charlotte Amalie and Cruz Bay.
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.

parameter.value: NWS: FLASH FLOOD WARNING this area til 10:00 PM AST. Avoid flooded areas.

National Weather Service: A FLASH FLOOD WARNING is in effect for this area until 10:00 PM AST. This is a dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.

area.areaDesc: Saint John, VI; Saint Thomas, VI

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS hasta 10:00 PM AST. Evite areas inundadas.

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS en efecto para esta area hasta las 10:00 PM AST. Esta es una situacion peligrosa y amenaza la vida. No intente viajar a menos que sea para abandonar un area propensa a inundaciones o bajo una orden de desalojo.

area.areaDesc: Saint John, VI; Saint Thomas, VI
